website_summaries.verdict: Optimized to deliver the speed and distance you want, even on slight mishits.
pros: Club face design reduces vibration during ball strike, delivering a precise feel
Club face has a large sweet spot to minimize problems with balls struck slightly off center
cons: Clubs almost feel too lightweight for some players

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are amazing!, great feel and control, they sound like a golf club should, I did not like too much the S and A clubs, nevertheless aren't too bad, I would suggest to buy your wedges separately. I received the clubs #5 & 6 opened and slightly scratched?, nothing too exceptional, I would recommend this clubs for mid-high handicappers like me.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Mata

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade over my Burner set of Taylormade's from 2011.
customer_reviews.text: You get a strong sound from impact with the ball. If you hit it well you will have much improved distance over older clubs. I used iron shafts for the Burner set and these also. I think the clubs are better than my ability, I make at least 10 to 15 years more distance out of the new clubs. Well worth the upgrade. The other day we were at a water hole, at least a 120 yard carry over water to a thin green. 135 yards to the pin. I used a 9 iron and over drove the green. My partner used a 7 iron and landed in the water. Very happy with the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reid

customer_reviews.title: One club blues
customer_reviews.text: On the second time trying to order Have made two phone calls I received one club the six iron Ordered the 5- PW,AW,SW The details at the bottom say one item 7.6lbs why
customer_reviews.author: edward burke

customer_reviews.title: Don't need to muscle
customer_reviews.text: i am 6'3" 215, moderate golfer. Stepping up from starter to next level. I find these very easy to swing, a-wedge has great feel. Hitting 5 and 6 easily, 225 and 200 accurately. Sounds real upon strike. Did scuff as reported. But only high end forged will scuff less. Great buy, will have these for years. 14 handicap now 10 after 15 rounds.
customer_reviews.author: arvind shenoy

customer_reviews.title: Great irons, no major cosmetic issues
customer_reviews.text: Great irons, hitting true and straight. Very forgiving on mishits and I think they look pretty nice too. Saw a lot of reviews about the club face getting destroyed after a single round or a few range sessions.... I’m 3 range sessions and 2 rounds deep and they still look pretty fresh, so no issues here.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My Husband could not be more thrilled with these new Golf Clubs . Thank Goodness it is starting to warm up here in NE Pa. so he can go out and enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Hess

customer_reviews.title: You'll get more distance with these clubs!
customer_reviews.text: I seem to get an additional 20 to 30 yards with these clubs over my older Rx7 clubs by Taylor Made. I love the added distance, but need to re-learn which clubs to select now, depending on distance.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Babb

customer_reviews.title: Heads of the clubs break off
customer_reviews.text: I love the irons, but after just 3 months of use, 2 of the heads (PW and 8 Iron) have come loose and the clubs are unusable without professional refurbishing. Very frustrating to see after buying top of the line clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin DeVore

customer_reviews.title: Good club, wrong length.
customer_reviews.text: Love you clubs themselves. Moving from an old set of Tommy Armors seriously made me fall in love with the game. After deciding to take golf a little more serious my instructor told me to go get fit and make sure the clubs were the right size. Sure enough the 5-9 were an inch over standard. TLDL: Clubs came in the wrong size and they needed to be resized, and regripped costing me $90 extra.
customer_reviews.author: Gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Do you want extra distance?
customer_reviews.text: Have picked up extra distance. Graphite shafts are great and have added swing speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clubs marked easily after only a few hits.
customer_reviews.text: The attached pictures were taken after hitting 5 balls on each club. Foot of club scratched easily as well as the club face. Disappointed that they marred so easily. Other reviews talked about the same issue. I was pleased with the feel of the clubs.
customer_reviews.author: AHFRITTS

customer_reviews.title: Added distance for sure
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved them and the added distance they have given him
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Grip came loose after 4 rounds of Golf
customer_reviews.text: The grip is loose and rotates left and right on my 6 iron after 4 rounds of golf. Wouldn't expect that with a new set of clubs like this.
customer_reviews.author: RM Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a early christmas present for my husband and he thinks there GREAT! The box they came in was a little beat up, but the clubs were brand new. Thank you for making his day
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Collupy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing, the feel amazing, I feel like my game has improved since getting these
customer_reviews.author: Erich gutsch

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs.
customer_reviews.text: I love these irons! Hit the same distance as my last set of irons but accuracy is much improved. Pretty forgiving off the toe. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is that they were all scratched up after the first round of play. Performance is so good I would still be them again though even with the finish issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Musatow

customer_reviews.title: M6 irons are very forgoving
customer_reviews.text: M6 irons are the most forging clubs I have ever had. Even when I have duffed a shot it went straight. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I love these clubs. Played my first round with them today and I can feel the difference. Allows me to slow down my swing and still get distance.
customer_reviews.author: Foday Kenneh

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Waited a long time for this set of clubs to go on sale. Finally a price I can live with. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon C. Knott

customer_reviews.title: Forgiving clubs that really work
customer_reviews.text: I bought an entire set of TaylorMade clubs and they are the very best clubs I have ever owned. Even though I am a single digit handicapper, these clubs perform significantly better than my Ben Hogan clubs.
customer_reviews.author: John McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.  Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly. Tried it at the range and I hope that I can handle it with the same results in the fairways.
customer_reviews.author: Chito

customer_reviews.title: Helping to turn my game around.
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are great for someone who is just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Early Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Look great and came super early. Can’t wait to try these out!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Pope

customer_reviews.title: One club when it should've been a set
customer_reviews.text: ordered a set of irons 5-AW and only got a 7 iron. I'll change my review if I actually receive what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the M6 for any serious golfer
customer_reviews.text: Only got to play two rounds of golf with the M6 irons before cold weather set in. Was real pleased with the feel at contact and the control of each shot. Thus far very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Finch

customer_reviews.title: Missing iron
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately missing a 7 iron from the set and won’t be able to call support until Monday. Other than that clubs are amazing and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: kamaka

customer_reviews.title: Swing Weight
customer_reviews.text: Pay close attention to the swing weight. These clubs are very light and although that allows you to swing faster, it doesn't translate into greater distance. I bought a set to replace my R7's and these don't even come close to the distance I get from my R7's ..... about 15yrds less. I bought mine on Ebay and got stung for $850 as they wont take returns. Do your homework and don't believe the hype!
customer_reviews.author: Pot Frog Awakening

customer_reviews.title: Clunky Sound and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a golf fitting because the shots went further than my old irons... However, the clubs have stronger loft angles than other clubs so can't compare one 7 iron to other clubs. Most importantly, even center hit shots sound like mis-hits. Lastly I had to replace a club because the bridge was not completely integrated and I was cut by the point. Makes me wonder about the longevity. Although I have had them less than one year, I have on order another set. The M6s have been my worst golf investment in 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Review

product_meta.title: TaylorMade Golf M6 Iron
product_meta.description: TaylorMade Men's M6 IronsOverview * TaylorMade M6 irons are pure distance and forgiveness machines, designed to help you hit the ball straighter and farther than ever. * The new Speed Bridge structure on the back allows TaylorMade to use their fastest thru-slot Speed Pocket for more ball speed than ever before. * Added stiffness around the perimeter of the club produces higher ball speed by reducing the amount of energy lost at impact. * An ultra-thin face with signature Inverted Cone Technology increase ball speeds across the entire club face. * The Speed Bridge structure also supports the topline to reduce vibrations for a more satisfying sound at impact. * An advanced HYBRAR compression damper filters unwanted face vibrations for a more solid feel on every shot. * A fluted hosel and 360A undercut lowers the center of gravity to provide greater launch and ball speed for a penetrating ball flight, even on impact low on the face. * TaylorMade M6 irons are ideal for golfers who are looking to improve their game through distance and forgiveness. Features * Speed Bridge Structure * Thru-Slot Speed Pocket * HYBRAR compression damper Speed Bridge StructureThe new Speed Bridge structure adds stiffness to the club head to generate high ball speeds by reducing the amount of energy lost at impact. It also supports the topline to reduce low-frequency vibrations for improved sound at impact.Thru-Slot Speed PocketThis design is used to generate the fastest ball speeds possible, creating a totally unsupported lower portion of the face to boost ball speed and distance.HYBRAR Compression DamperAn advanced compression damper filters out unwanted face vibrations for a more solid feel at impact.
feature_bullets: MORE SPEED WITH SPEED BRIDGE: The new Speed Bridge structure unlocks the ability to use our fastest thru-slot Speed Pocket for the first time in our players distance category

IMPROVED SOUND AND FEEL: Speed Bridge supports the topline to reduce low-frequency vibrations for a more satisfying sound at impact; Advanced HYBRAR compression damper effectively filters unwanted face vibrations for a soft and solid feel on all shots

OPTIMIZED FOR FORGIVENESS AND PLAYABILITY: Fluted Hostel and 360° undercut effectively lowers CG to increase launch angle and ball speed to generate a strong, penetrating ball flight even on low-face impacts;

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
